name: Pavia
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: In September 1501 Pavia Italy was the birthplace of Gerolamo (Jerome) Cardano, whom the Cardano blockchain project was named after. 2021 sees the launch of Pavia.io which is a metaverse being built on Cardano. It seems fitting to name our virtual world Pavia. $PAVIA tokens are for utility purposes inside the pavia.io metaverse.
